title: Cheshire Dave come back to us!
content:
Kinda late, but today was the birthday for our favorite cat, Cheshire Dave. He used to roam the halls here on a regular basis. We miss him.

Happy Birthday, Chesh!

 [‹ premium looking typefaces](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821193002/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40810 "Go to previous forum topic") [18th-19th century handwriting ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821193002/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40865 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Miss Tiffany

comments.content:
Yay for font cats!

Happy birthday Cheshire Dave.

j a m e s

Tiff - he did put in an appearance on the Album cover thread...

Happy Birthday!

I spotted him here the other day too.

Coincidently, I had to send a link for [Behind The Typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821193002/http:/www.veer.com/ideas/btt/) to my sales director yesterday after he’d made some disparaging remarks about Cooper Black. He’a not come back to me yet.

Happy birthday indeed Chesh.
Happy birthday indeed, Chesh. I was momentarily distracted by extensive birthday celebrations, but here are my belated birthday wishes. I hope you had a good one. :^)

Thanks, all — I miss you guys too! That album cover meme was fantastic — I enjoyed taking part in that. It’s one of my new year’s resolutions to reclaim more of the fun things in my life, and of course Typophile is a big one. See you again soon and more regularly!
